alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Volusia County through 515 PM EDT... At 447 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near DeLand Airport, or near DeLand. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... DeLand, Lake Helen, DeLand Airport and DeLand Highlands. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
